properties.author: Al Major

section.name: Download and Installation
section.p: To use Joda-Time you need to download the latest version. The download will contain the joda-time jar file. Once you add this to your classpath you will be able to use Joda-Time.
The binary download also includes joda-time-sources.jar, which is a jar file of the source code suitable for linking to the jar file in IDEs such as Eclipse.
